title: Minced meat pizza
ingredients: ['For the dough', '2 teaspoons honey', '2 teaspoons dried active yeast', '560g plain flour, plus more if needed', '2 teaspoons salt', 'extra virgin oil', 'For the topping', '1 (500g) jar pasta sauce, as needed', '500g beef or other mince', '3 medium onions, sliced', '3 medium tomatoes, sliced', '480g mozzarella, shredded']
